waxing_services.title: Full Body Waxing (Rica)
waxing_services.view_details: Includes arms, legs, underarms, stomach, back
waxing_services.description: Get smooth and soft skin with Rica wax for the full body. Ideal for all skin types, especially sensitive skin.

waxing_services.title: Half Legs Waxing (Honey)
waxing_services.description: Affordable and quick leg waxing using natural honey wax for a clean finish.

waxing_services.title: Underarms Waxing (Rica)
waxing_services.description: Removes hair effectively with minimal pain and prevents ingrown hair.

waxing_services.title: Full Arms Waxing (Honey)
waxing_services.description: Classic honey wax for soft and hair-free arms. Great for normal skin types.

waxing_services.title: Bikini Line Waxing (Rica)
waxing_services.view_details: Covers bikini line only, not Brazilian
waxing_services.description: Delicate area waxing using Rica wax to ensure gentle care and hygiene.

waxing_services.title: Face Waxing (Rica)
waxing_services.description: Suitable for facial skin, removes fine hair and gives a smooth texture using Rica wax.

waxing_services.title: Full Legs + Arms Combo (Rica)
waxing_services.view_details: Full arms and full legs waxing combo
waxing_services.description: Time-saving combo with Rica wax to get smooth, hair-free limbs at once.
